name: Hunters of the High Road
description:
"The hunt hath begun."

Control a hunter of the church and slay mythical beasts! Utilize your holy-infused weaponry and wits to vanquish unholy bosses!

Description

Set in Scotland during the 1800's, Hunters of the High Road is a top-down boss-focussed action game with punishing combat against monsters that are based on mythological creatures of Scotland. Armed with a hunting rifle and an executioner sword, both imbued with holy energy, the player controls one of Wrath's Apostles - a sinner-turned-hunter who is trained to track and slay unholy monsters to repent.

Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Left Shift - Roll
  • Right Click - Aim Rifle
  • Left Click - Shoot Rifle
  • E - Use Sword
  • Esc - Pause Game
